name: Hanna in a Choppa 3
summary: Take flight in the latest installment of the hugely popular Hanna in a Choppa series of games. Guide Hanna through 10 bonkers levels, each with hidden secrets and achievements. Train your pet elephant Stompy, steal honey from pesky bees, humiliate upgraded OXOBot at his own game, and of course, The Button makes a spectacular return.
